hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Slingshot#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Sun's Song#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #0# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #an Ocarina#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #0# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: One who does not have Triforce can't go in.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: I've heard Ganon dislikes lemon-flavored popsicles.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Farore's Wind#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Zelda's Lullaby#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in the castle courtyard you can see a portrait of a young Talon.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Slingshot#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Arrows#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Compass Room Side Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Arrows#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Megaton Hammer# and #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)# and #a Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Carpenters' tent#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Zelda's Lullaby#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Side Room Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.
